column1: Sharing of prayers and memories will take place at 12:00 Noon on Saturday
column3: 2015 at the Suchon Funeral Home in Plymouth. Visitation will be held at the Suchon Funeral Home at 10:00 A.M. on Saturday (June 27) until the time of the services. The celebration will continue for Patty at The Brown Bottle in Plymouth starting at 12:30 P.M. with the sharing of memories and more stories.
